item.description:
This is an easy 2.5 mile hike that includes a relatively scenic view from the summit of Lookout Mountain (744 ft.). Portions of the trail include the Shenipsit Trail.

The hike is anticipated to last 1 hour and rise 350 feet. Overall the hike should start at 5:30 PM and be done by about 6:30 PM. We'll meet in the parking lot. A map can be found as hike #6 in the "50 Hikes in Connecticut" book by the Connecticute Forest and Parks Association. There is no meal planed for after this one (Leader has a meeting to get to, sorry!)

The leader on this hike is Kevin S so please direct questions on the hike to him.

Directions from Hartford:
* Take I-84 E to I-384
* Take Exit 4 off of I-384 (Highland St.)
* From the end of the Exit ramp, right onto Spring St.
* Go about 0.2 mile and make a sharp left and you'll see a small parking lot at the bottom of the hill on your left.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Hike to Highland Springs and Lookout Mountain in Manchester CT
